name: SPEC_MARKER_INFO
description: This table stores information about markers used on specimens.

columns.name: HSC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_MARKER_LENGTH_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document the length of a marker used on a specimen

columns.name: SPECIMEN_MARKER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the type of marker used on a specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_MARKER_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the location on a specimen where a marker was used.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_MARKER_ORIENTATION_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the orientation of a marker used on a specimen.
